testcase.name: Successful completion of purchase order
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Successful completion of purchase order Given User login as 'standard' user ... untested in 0.000s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... untested in 0.000s When User adds item 'backpack' to the cart ... untested in 0.000s And User adds item 'fleece jacket' to the cart ... untested in 0.000s And User clicks on the cart icon ... untested in 0.000s And User proceeds to checkout page ... untested in 0.000s And User fills checkout details with first name:'John', last name:'Doe', and postal code:'12345' ... untested in 0.000s Then User continue from checkout overview ... untested in 0.000s When User verifies total amount as well as finishes the order ... untested in 0.000s Then User should see the order confirmation page with message Thank you for your order! ... untested in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
